thread.title: Slavish copier Samsung races to knock off Apple’s ‘3D Touch’ in Galaxy S7

title: Slavish copier Samsung races to knock off Apple’s ‘3D Touch’ in Galaxy S7
text:
Published By: MacDailyNews.com - Today 
Samsung has tapped Synaptics to use its ClearForce technology to respond to various levels of screen pressure
